about.header: I am Carlos Hernandez, full stack web developer from Houston, Texas
about.subHeader: I'm currently sharpening my skills and learning lots of new technologies
about.reason: The fist time I saw a in my life and I had the computer lab in the 5th grade. It was the coolest thing ever I pressed a key in the keyboard and it appeared on the monitor
about.why: From the first line of code to last project I worked, I keep learning new things, new technologies, new best pratices and there's always something more to learn, and that's my favorite part about being a programmer!
